description: Manages a V2 Neutron addressscope resource within OpenStack.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

IpVersion.description:
IP version, either 4 (default) or 6. Changing this
creates a new address-scope.

Name.description:
The name of the address-scope. Changing this updates the
name of the existing address-scope.

ProjectId.description:
The owner of the address-scope. Required if admin
wants to create a address-scope for another project. Changing this creates a
new address-scope.

Region.description:
The region in which to obtain the V2 Networking client.
A Networking client is needed to create a Neutron address-scope. If omitted,
the `region` argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new
address-scope.

Shared.description:
Indicates whether this address-scope is shared across
all projects. Changing this updates the shared status of the existing
address-scope.
